block.p: COHEN-William ''Bill.'' Former proprietor of The Inner Circle and Damon's restaurants. Devoted husband of Helen (nee Frankel); beloved father of Harriett Stievelman and Barbara Sand; a special father-in-law to Jack Stievelman; loving grandfather of Jodi Deutsch, Troy, Kerri Rosenthal, Gabi Mandel, and Mia DiDio. Dear great-grandfather. Fond brother of the late Irene Krantz and Molly Block. Services Nassau North Chapel, 55 Station Plaza North, Great Neck, 12:45, Monday.
